title: "Jidu Auto steps up to roll out mass-produced robocars"
excerpt: "Smart electric vehicle company Jidu Auto, a joint venture established by Chinese tech giant Baidu Inc and carmaker Geely Holding Group, plans to launch its first mass-produced robocar model in the coming autumn and open the first self-owned store in the fourth quarter of this year."
